description: Prior notification for the erection of a single storey extension above third floor to provide two flats
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-b1032208-7fff-25be-9a66-6c3441bcac6d"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">The proposed development would result in a loss of daylight to nearby occupiers and in the absence of BRE daylight report, therefore fall within the parameters of Class AB.-1(1)(g) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended)</span>  </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><br></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap;"> </span></p>
